song.title: Breath of Air (2 x 3-channels)
song.info:
A note from AY Riders:
A cover the good old Amiga demo scene song from the early 90's - Breath of Air by Nuke/Anarchy. Feel the fresh and melodic multichannel tune! We're breaking record again - Breath of Air is played on two ZX Spectrums!
Download from ay-riders.speccy.cz: http://ay-riders.speccy.cz/download/satellite/02-X-agon-Breath_of_air(2x3-channels).mp3
